name: Cayla
text: I surprised my wife and soon to be mother of our baby boy Parker James with these monthly care packages and she looks forward to them more and more every month.

name: Thoren
text: My husband gifted me Bump Boxes and I look forward to my box every single month! They include quality products that I didn’t even know I needed/wanted half of the time!

name: Kate
text: As you can see the kids were thrilled with their Bump Boxes! It’s the first child for them, and the first grandchild for us… we are all over the moon!

name: Lily
text: I love this subscription! The products are always great quality and perfect for a mom-to-be!

name: Emilly
text: I took it as a gift for my niece. Very pleasant materials, everything is of high quality, definitely worth the money. The size suited the child perfectly. I recommend!

name: Diana
text: I was given a box and I am happy because finally someone cares about my needs. Pleasant smells and textures, very useful filling, this is what you need! But I would add lactation discs.

name: Kate
text: As you can see the kids were thrilled with their Bump Boxes! It’s the first child for them, and the first grandchild for us… we are all over the moon!

name: Lily
text: I love this subscription! The products are always great quality and perfect for a mom-to-be!
